Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Texas 42 Domino Game with AI Bots

Complete multiplayer Texas 42 domino game with free local AI bots.

Features:
- User authentication (signup, signin, guest mode)
- Real-time multiplayer with WebSocket
- Full Texas 42 rules implementation
- AI bot players with intelligent bidding and play
- Game lobby and spectator mode
- Local network play support

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Improve AI bot intelligence for smarter gameplay

Enhanced AI bidding and playing strategies:

Bidding improvements:
- Calculate hand strength for all 7 suits
- Consider doubles (worth 8 points each)
- Factor in count dominoes (5-0, 4-1, 3-2, 6-4, 5-5)
- Smart bid thresholds based on hand strength
- More conservative passing when hand is weak

Playing improvements:
- Lead with trump doubles or count dominoes when possible
- Try to win tricks by playing lowest winning card
- Dump low non-count dominoes when can''t win
- Protect valuable count dominoes
- Better trump suit evaluation

AI bots now play competitively and make strategic decisions!

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
